title: four Borettoの著作リスト
content:
[[include :scp-jp:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-jp:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]

:root {
 --header-title: "第五教会" !important;
 --header-subtitle: "星辰の啓蒙、煙のシグナル" !important;
 --gray-monochrome: 0, 0, 0;
 --logo-image: url("http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:3282741-83-bj2f/Fifthist.png");
 --body-font: Inter, Verdana, Geneva, "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", Arial, sans-serif !important;
 --UI-font: PTRootUI, -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen-Sans, Ubuntu, Cantrell, "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol" !important;
 --header-font: Inter, Franklin Gothic Medium, Franklin Gothic, ITC Franklin Gothic, "Helvetica Neue", "Helvetica", Arial, sans-serif !important;
 --mono-font: Recursive, Consolas, monaco, monospace !important;
 --min-font-size: 0.75rem;
 --max-font-size: 0.78rem;
 --base-font-size: 0.90rem;
 --base-line-height: 1.5;
 --toggle-roundness: 0 !important;

 --header-gradient-color-top: 237,213,225;
 --header-gradient-color-middle: 255,230,242;
 --header-gradient-color-bottom: 153,138,145;
 --diagonal-stripes: none !important;
 --swatch-background: 200,200,200;
 --background-gradient-color: 130,130,130;
 --swatch-menubg-color: 80,80,80;
 --pale-accent: 0,0,0;
 --bright-accent: 251,210,228;
 --medium-accent: 0,0,0;
 --dark-accent: 0,0,0;
 --alt-accent: 0,0,0;
}

#side-bar {
 --base-font-size: 0.85rem !important;
}
#container {
 overflow: hidden;
}
@media (max-width: 479px) {
 #page-content {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
 }
}
#page-content a {
    text-decoration: underline;
    text-decoration-color: rgb(251, 210, 228);
}
#page-content a:hover {
    text-decoration-thickness: 2px;
}
#page-content .yui-nav a {
    text-decoration: none;
}

[[/module]]

> **注:** もし仮にお祝いのコメント等があるのであれば、ディスカッションではなく心の中でしていただけると嬉しいです。
author: four Boretto
